message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe will be very valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $13,500.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of making an offer of $11,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value of similar products.
Bob, thanks for the offer, but $11,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $12,500 to make this deal work. Let me know if you're interested in that.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our offers, so I'll make a counteroffer of $12,000. Let me know if that works for you.
